scripts.dev-server: sleep 2 && chokidar --initial "./dist-tsc/js/" -c "npm run kill-server && npm run server"
scripts.kill-server: NPM_SCRIPT='npm run server' && SERVER='node' && NPM_SH="sh -c $SERVER" && USER=$(whoami) && NPM_SCRIPT_PID=$(pgrep --full --euid "$USER" "$NPM_SCRIPT" | head --lines=1) && if [ "$NPM_SCRIPT_PID" != '' ]; then NPM_SH_PID=$(pgrep --full --euid "$USER" --parent "$NPM_SCRIPT_PID" "$NPM_SH" | head --lines=1) && if [ "$NPM_SH_PID" != '' ]; then SERVER_PID=$(pgrep --euid "$USER" --parent "$NPM_SH_PID" "$SERVER" | head --lines=1) && if [ "$SERVER_PID" != '' ]; then kill "$SERVER_PID" "$NPM_SH_PID" "$NPM_SCRIPT_PID" && echo '	Killed server'; fi fi fi
scripts.kill-server-debug: NPM_SCRIPT='npm run server' && echo "NPM_SCRIPT $NPM_SCRIPT" && SERVER='node' && echo "SERVER $SERVER" && NPM_SH="sh -c $SERVER" && echo "NPM_SH $NPM_SH" && USER=$(whoami) && echo "USER $USER" && NPM_SCRIPT_PID=$(pgrep --full --euid "$USER" "$NPM_SCRIPT" | head --lines=1) && echo "NPM_SCRIPT_PID '$NPM_SCRIPT_PID'" && if [ "$NPM_SCRIPT_PID" != '' ]; then NPM_SH_PID=$(pgrep --full --euid "$USER" --parent "$NPM_SCRIPT_PID" "$NPM_SH" | head --lines=1) && echo "NPM_SH_PID '$NPM_SH_PID'" && if [ "$NPM_SH_PID" != '' ]; then SERVER_PID=$(pgrep --euid "$USER" --parent "$NPM_SH_PID" "$SERVER" | head --lines=1) && if [ "$SERVER_PID" != '' ]; then echo "SERVER_PID '$SERVER_PID'" && kill "$SERVER_PID" "$NPM_SH_PID" "$NPM_SCRIPT_PID" && echo '	Killed server'; fi fi fi
